H3.text: who was running as vice president in 1984. Ferraro

A4.text: Mondale selected Ferraro to be his vice‑presidential candidate on July 12, 1984.

A5.text: She was the party's nominee for vice president in the 1984 presidential election, running alongside presidential candidate and former vice president Walter Mondale; this made her the first female vice‑presidential nominee representing a major American political party.
